last_episode_to_air.name: Canelo/Golovkin 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: 24/7 is HBO's reality series that goes behind-the-scenes with athletes as they prepare for future matchups. The series debuted in 2007 with a look at Oscar De La Hoya and Floyd Mayweather Jr. as they prepared to face each other for the junior-middleweight title. Later seasons focused on other boxing matchups, in addition to NASCAR driver Jimmie Johnson and multiple NHL teams.

overview: 24/7 is an American reality television series that follows sportsmen, and sporting organizations, for a period of weeks in the lead-up to a major sporting event. The show premiered with episodes featuring pairs of boxers as they prepare for their upcoming boxing match against one another. More recently it has expanded to other sport rivalries as well with NASCAR and the rivalry leading up to the 2011 NHL Winter Classic. Each edition of the show is generally split up into three to four episodes, and is narrated by Liev Schreiber.

Penguins/Capitals: Road to the NHL Winter Classic #1
episodes.overview: HBO cameras follow the NHL's Pittsburgh Penguins and Washington Capitals around their daily activities as they move closer the Winter Classic outdoor hockey game on January 1st.  Each teams' demeanor starkly contrast with each other.  The Penguins are having fun and enjoying their work as they are in the middle of a long winning streak while the capitals are shown as downtrodden and depressed while they suffer through their longest losing streak in years.

episodes.name: Penguins/Capitals: Road to the NHL Winter Classic #2
episodes.overview: The Penguins and Capitals fight for first place in their respective Eastern Conference divisions. Following a home game versus Anaheim, the Caps head to Boston and Ottawa. Meanwhile, the Pens visit their in-state rivals in Philadelphia for a significant Atlantic Division showdown before hosting the New York Rangers and Phoenix Coyotes.

episodes.name: Penguins/Capitals: Road to the NHL Winter Classic #3
episodes.overview: Preparations begin in Pittsburgh to set up the hockey rink at Heinz Field. Also: the teams face each other on the ice in Washington.

episodes.name: Penguins/Capitals: Road to the NHL Winter Classic #4
episodes.overview: The game is delayed by rain, but the teams finally take the ice under the lights at Heinz Field in Pittsburgh

episodes.name: Penguins/Capitals: The Winter Classic
episodes.overview: The Game

episodes.name: Mayweather vs. Ortiz: Show #1
episodes.overview: Boxers Floyd Mayweather and Victor Ortiz train for their September 2011 bout in the opener of this reality series, which follows preparations leading up to their welterweight-title fight in Las Vegas.

episodes.name: Mayweather vs. Ortiz: Show #2
episodes.overview: As training camp activities heat up, both fighters find time to alter the routine, as Mayweather goes car shopping and Ortiz does an interview with Piers Morgan.

episodes.name: Mayweather vs. Ortiz: Show #3
episodes.overview: With the welterweight title showdown just a week away, the intensity of training camp goes up a notch and both camps sharpen their game plan.

episodes.name: Pacquiao vs. Marquez: Show #1
episodes.overview: The fighters open training camps, with Manny Pacquiao working in Baguio City, and Juan Manuel Marquez in Mexico City.

episodes.name: Pacquiao vs. Marquez: Show #2
episodes.overview: Manny Pacquiao settles in training in Los Angeles and acquires an expensive new toy; Juan Manuel Marquez continues his training in the altitude of Mexico City with a new conditioning coach.

episodes.name: Pacquiao vs. Marquez: Show #3
episodes.overview: Training intensifies with a week remaining until the fight.

episodes.name: Pacquiao vs. Marquez: Show #4
episodes.overview: The fighters break camp and participate in fight week activities.

episodes.name: 24/7 Cotto/Margarito Episode 1
episodes.overview: Super welterweights Miguel Cotto and Antonio Margarito train for their Dec. 3 fight, and look back at their first encounter.

episodes.name: 24/7 Cotto/Margarito Episode 2
episodes.overview: Super welterweights Miguel Cotto and Antonio Margarito train for their Dec. 3 fight.

episodes.name: Flyers/Rangers: Road to the Winter Classic #1
episodes.overview: Part 1 of HBO's exclusive look into the preparations by the New York Rangers and Philadelphia Flyers for the 2012 Winter Classic.

episodes.name: Flyers/Rangers: Road to the Winter Classic #2
episodes.overview: The Flyers' winning streak continues as they head into a big game against the Stanley Cup-champion Bruins. However, there is bad news on the injury front. The Rangers hit a rough patch on the road.

episodes.name: Flyers/Rangers: Road to the Winter Classic #3
episodes.overview: The Flyers and Rangers square off at Madison Square Garden prior to their showdown in the Winter Classic. The transformation of Citizens Bank Park, site of the outdoors game, continues.

episodes.name: Flyers/Rangers: Road to the Winter Classic #4
episodes.overview:
After beating the Flyers at Madison Square Garden, the Rangers hit the road. Before trying to continue their dominance of the orange and black when they face off outside on january 2nd.

Meanwhile the Flyers take on their cross state rivals, the Pittsburgh Penguins, once more prior to heading home to hit the ice agains the Rangers in the Winter Classic.

episodes.name: Flyers/Rangers: The Winter Classic
episodes.overview: The Game
